main event: On 6 September 1968, a civilian reported sighting a UFO in Cincinnati, Ohio.
interesting points: The observer's daughter claimed to have photographed the UFO, but no photos were forwarded to the Air Force by the due date., The observer described the sighted object as a round bright object moving fast, leaving a distortion in the atmosphere., Two objects were observed moving slowly for about 15 minutes before disappearing from view., There were no physical evidence or photographs on file to support the claims., The object's description resembled that of a garment bag hot air balloon.
witness description: Civilian observer who reported the sighting and claimed her daughter captured it on film.
